gurmukhi: bIc qbY nB mMfl cMfkw ju`Du kirE ijm Awgy n hoaU ]
transliteration: Boodhe Tabai Nabh Mandal Channdakaa Juddh(u) Kario Jim Aage Na Hooo||
translation: Such a war was waged by Chandi in the sky, as had never been waged before.

gurmukhi: sUrj cMdu inC`qR scIpiq Aaur sBY sur pyKq soaU ]
transliteration: Sooraj Channd(u) Nichhattra Sachoopat(i) Aur Sabhai Sur Pekhat Sooo||
translation: The sun, moon, stars, Indra and all other gods saw that war.

gurmukhi: KYc kY mUMf deI krvwr kI eyk ko mwr kIey qb doaU ]
transliteration: Khaich Kai Moondd Daoo Karvaar Koo Ek Ko Maar Kooe Tab Dooo||
translation: The goddess pulled out her sword and struck it on the neck of Sumbh, cutting his body into two parts.

gurmukhi: suMB du tUk hÍY BUim pirE qn ijau klvqR so cIrq koaU ]221]
transliteration: Sounbh Du Took Hvai Bhoom(i) Pario Tan Jio Kalvatra So Choorat Kooo||221||
translation: The body of Sumbh cut into two fell in such a way on the earth as the same had been ripped by the saw.221.

gurmukhi: suMB mwr kY cMfkw auTI su sMK bjwie ]
transliteration: Sounbh Maar Kai Channdakaa Outhoo Su Sankh Bajaae||
translation: After killing Sumbh, Chnadika rose to blow her conch.

gurmukhi: qb Duin GMtw kI krI mhwN sod mn pwie ]222]
transliteration: Tab Dhoun(i) Ghantaa Koo Daroo8 Mahaan Mod Man Paae||222||
translation: Then she sounded the gong as a mark of Victory, with great delight in her mind.222.

gurmukhi: dYq rwj iCn mY hinE dyvI ieh pirkwr ]
transliteration: Dait Raaj Chin Mai Hanio Devoo Eh Parikaar||
translation: The goddess killed the king of demons in this way in an instant.

gurmukhi: Ast krn mih ssqR gih sYnw deI sMGwr ]223]
transliteration: Ast Karan Maih Sastra Gad(i) Sainaa Daoo Sanhaar||223||
translation: Holding her weapons in her eight hands, she destroyed the army of demons. 223.

gurmukhi: cMf ky kop n Ep rhI rn mY Ais Dwr BeI smuhweI ]
transliteration: Channd Ke Kop Na Op Rahoo Ran Mai As(i) Dhaar Bhaoo Samuhaaoo||
translation: When Chnadi appeared with her sword in the battlefield. None of the demons could withstand her ire.

gurmukhi: mwir ibdwir sMGwir dey qb BUp ibnw kry kaun lrweI ]
transliteration: Daar(i) Bidaar(i) Sandaar(i) Dae Tab Bhoop Binaa Dare Kaoun Laraaoo||
translation: She killed and destroyed all, who can then wage a war without the king?

gurmukhi: kwNp auTy Air qRws hIey Dir Cwif deI sB paurKqweI ]
transliteration: Kaanp Outhe Ar(i) Traas Hooe Dhar(i) Chhaad(i) Daoo Sabh Paurakhtaaoo||
translation: The enemies trembled with fear in their hearts, they abandoned the pride of their heroism.
